Posts.Content: I just received a call for a retake and ultra sound, had mamagram last Friday, will go back on Friday, had previous biopsy's but that was on the right side today they see something on the left. I was told I might get a call back since this was my first digital mamagram, so I am thinking and hoping there is nothing to this, but will go back just to make sure.........................
Posts.Title: update! on Repeat mammogram & ultrasound
